text: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano pahāraṃ dadeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano pahāraṃ dadeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 74. Should any bhikkhu, angered and displeased, give a blow to (another) bhikkhu, it is to be confessed.
๗๔. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใด โกรธน้อยใจให้ประหารแก่ภิกษุ เป็นปาจิตตีย์
74. Should any bhikkhu, being angry and displeased, give a bhikkhu a blow, it entails expiation.
